sentences.sContent: In general fine particles tend to clump and agglomerate if they are moist or tacky .
sentences.sContent_eng: In general fine particles tend to clump and agglomerate if they are moist or tacky .
sentences.sCn: 通常潮湿和粘性的微细颗粒易于聚集和结块。

synos.tran: 凝聚的；[植][无脊椎]成团的，[冶]结块的
[冶]团块；[岩]集块岩；[化学]附聚物

remMethod.val: ag + glomer (球) + ate (做) → 滚成球 → 凝聚

words.tran: 会凝聚的；[冶] 烧结的，凝结的

trans.tranCn: 使成团， 使成块， 使凝聚
trans.tranOther: to form or be formed into a mass or cluster; collect
